registered in the Commercial Registry with the Bulgarian Registry Agency with UIC 106588084, having

Municipality, Pernik District, Bulgaria ("TBL"), and Mechel International Holdings GmbH, a company
incorporated in Switzerland under registration number CH-170.3.025.255-2 with its registered office
address at Oberdorfstrasse 11, CH-6340 Baar, Switzerland ("MIH")

We act on behalf of MIH as per the enclosed power of attorney.
All capitalized terms used in this First Written Demand bear the meaning as ascribed under the Deed of

Hereby MIH demands within 5 working days from receipt of this First Written Demand full payment of
all due and outstanding amounts as described herein along with any accruing interest, to the following

Bank: Coalmetbank JSC
